sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CATBBRAM( BRAM_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4), BRAM_STND_GUBN CHAR(1), BRAM_STND_DEGR VARCHAR(10), BRAM_MATL_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0), BRAM_MATL_NAME VARCHAR(80), BRAM_MATL_CODE VARCHAR(8), BRAM_IMPT_CODE CHAR(3), BRAM_MATL_PRIC NUMBER(14, 6), BRAM_MATL_UNT0 VARCHAR(8), BRAM_MATL_UNIT VARCHAR(8), BRAM_MATL_USE0 NUMBER(13, 5), BRAM_MATL_APLY NUMBER(13, 5), BRAM_APPL_GUBN CHAR(1), BRAM_REMK VARCHAR(200), BRAM_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), BRAM_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(8), BRAM_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), BRAM_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(8), CONSTRAINT CATBBRAM_PK PRIMARY KEY ( BRAM_CORP_CODE, BRAM_STND_GUBN, BRAM_STND_DEGR, BRAM_MATL_SEQ0 ) )

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03, C04, C05) AS ( SELECT 1, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_CORP_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 4 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_STND_GUBN', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_STND_DEGR', 'VARCHAR', 10 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_MATL_SEQ0', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_MATL_NAME', 'VARCHAR', 80 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_MATL_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_IMPT_CODE', 'CHAR', 3 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_MATL_PRIC', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_MATL_UNT0', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_MATL_UNIT', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_MATL_USE0', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_MATL_APLY', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_APPL_GUBN', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_REMK', 'VARCHAR', 200 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 15, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_UPDT_CMAN', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 16, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_UPDT_DATE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 17, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_INIT_CMAN', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 18, 'CATBBRAM' , 'BRAM_INIT_DATE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COLUMN_NAME IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.C02 AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C03 ORDER BY A.C01

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03) AS ( SELECT 1, 'BRAM_CORP_CODE', '법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'BRAM_STND_GUBN', '표준구분' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'BRAM_STND_DEGR', '개정차수 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'BRAM_MATL_SEQ0', '재료SEQ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'BRAM_MATL_NAME', '재료명' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'BRAM_MATL_CODE', '재료코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'BRAM_IMPT_CODE', '수입코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'BRAM_MATL_PRIC', '재료단가' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'BRAM_MATL_UNT0', '단위' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'BRAM_MATL_UNIT', '환산단위' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'BRAM_MATL_USE0', '사용량' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'BRAM_MATL_APLY', '적용량' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'BRAM_APPL_GUBN', '적용여부' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14, 'BRAM_REMK', 'REMARK' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 15, 'BRAM_UPDT_CMAN', '수정자' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 16, 'BRAM_UPDT_DATE', '수정일' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 17, 'BRAM_INIT_CMAN', '등록자' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 18, 'BRAM_INIT_DATE', '등록일' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,B.TABLE_NAME ,B.COMMENTS ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = #table_name# AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C02
sql-descriptor.sq: WITH T01 ( BRAM_CORP_CODE ,BRAM_STND_GUBN ,BRAM_STND_DEGR ,BRAM_MATL_SEQ0 ,BRAM_MATL_NAME ,BRAM_MATL_CODE ,BRAM_IMPT_CODE ,BRAM_MATL_PRIC ,BRAM_MATL_UNT0 ,BRAM_MATL_UNIT ,BRAM_MATL_USE0 ,BRAM_MATL_APLY ,BRAM_APPL_GUBN ,BRAM_REMK ,BRAM_UPDT_CMAN ,BRAM_UPDT_DATE ,BRAM_INIT_CMAN ,BRAM_INIT_DATE ) AS ( #DATA_TEXT# ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.SYS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN CATBBRAM B ON B.BRAM_CORP_CODE = A.BRAM_CORP_CODE AND B.BRAM_STND_GUBN = A.BRAM_STND_GUBN AND B.BRAM_STND_DEGR = A.BRAM_STND_DEGR AND B.BRAM_MATL_SEQ0 = A.BRAM_MATL_SEQ0
